name: Super Aeon
description:
This is a side scrolling game. It was made just for fun. Its goal to get the most 
highest score. You can use it on your own risk.

You  move  the  player  with  the  up  arrow  key  or  left mouse.  You  catch the
UFO add one to  life, catch the ORB make you powerful, you  can  destroy some 
types of rockets  for a certain time.  Without power avoid rockets, it can damage
you. 

No real rockets, animals, plants and humans hurt during creating this game.
